wybug_title: APP365在线物流管理系统SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-24：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-03-24：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 说实话我是捡来的啊观http://www.wooyun.org/bugs/wooyun-2010-074765有感而发 详细说明：  之前说要5个案例，只能重新提交了。为什么我的通用没有钱呢？好了正题：深圳市应用三六五网络科技有限公司(APP365)是一家具有雄厚技术实力和创新能力的新型高科技企业。APP365由资深IT行业人士、投资精英、物流行业管理专家共同创立，致力于云计算产品、在线物流管理平台、物流交易平台的研发。APP365旗下产品包括：APP365货运专线系统、APP365快运快递系统、APP365快递管理系统、APP365第三方物流系统、APP365仓储管理系统、APP365 GPS调度系统、APP365海运管理系统、APP365 物流交易平台。官方地址：http://www.app365.com/common/customer.jhtml案例搜索方法:inurl:trackOrder.jspx

案例:http://www.jpt56.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx btn=88952634&city_name=%E8%AF%B7%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%2F%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%90%8D%E7%A7%B0 http://www.shdushi56.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx province_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634 http://www.wistron.cc/site56/Station/stationList.jspx province_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634 http://www.hal.net.cn/site56/Station/stationList.jspx rovince_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634 http://www.hacc56.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx province_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634 http://www.56yt.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx btn=88952634&city_name=%E8%AF%B7%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%2F%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%90%8D%E7%A7%B0 http://www.jab56.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx province_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634 http://www.lingdao56.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx province_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634 http://andaoda.doorlink.cn/site56/Station/stationList.jspx province_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634 http://hxwl.56tai.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx province_id=88952634&city_id=88952634&district_id=88952634&city_name=88952634    漏洞证明：  只演示1个站,建议在win7系统下复现http://www.jpt56.com/site56/Station/stationList.jspx btn=88952634&city_name=%E8%AF%B7%E9%80%89%E6%8B%A9%2F%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%90%8D%E7%A7%B0

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
